revised_title: The Development and Morphology of the Sympathetic Nervous System in Mammals
tldr: This article investigates the development, morphology, and functions of the mammalian sympathetic nervous system. The author discusses the structure and functions of the ganglia in the main sympathetic chain, as well as the challenges in understanding its morphology and development. The article also explores the embryological origins of the sympathetic nervous system and its relationship to the spinal nerves and vertebrae.
